channel.description: Recent content in Javascript on loikein

item.title: Notes on Introduction to JavaScript
item.description: Basics Constant Variable Assignment Operator Increment Operator String + Varible Property Method Built-in Object Math Number 19 个 JavaScript 有用的简写技术 - SangSir - SegmentFault 思否 表达式和运算符 - JavaScript | MDN Basics console.log( 'hello, world' ); // comment /* multi-line comment */ console.log( 22 + 3.5 ); console.log( 2019 - 1969 ); console.log( 65 / 240 ); console.log( 0.2708 * 100 ); console.log( 'mind ' + 'the' + ' ' + 'gap' ); // mind the gap Constant const someConst = 'do not change'; someConst = 'hey'; // Error Variable var someNumber = 7; var someString = 'what'; let someBoolean = true; someBoolean = false; console.
